data.text:
It was perfecto ! Marc was a perfect manager it  was amazing and the food was so good ! 
The service was excellent , Everthing was clean and was going fast. We passed a amazing night, it was perfect. I’m sure we Will come back, As soon as possible……..
data.title: Perfect food

data.text: Superb Sofitel, one of the most enjoyable stays  I have had in Spain. Room was wonderful, restaurant was genuinely superb (croquets, patatas bravaa & paella; all really excellent). Flying solo this time, but I will bring my wife next time and stay a while…this would be a terrific hotel to come home to while in Barcelona.
data.title: Superb room, service and food

data.text: This is one of the best hotels I’ve stayed at.  It’s in a fantastic location, near the beach.  The rooms were clean, spacious, and beautifully decorated.  Everyone we encountered at the hotel was friendly, professional, and very helpful.  Tiago from concierge was wonderful, friendly, and recommended some really good restaurants.  And Genis was so welcoming, warm, and friendly.  I cannot find one fault with this hotel, and I would never stay anywhere else in Barcelona.
data.title: One of the best hotels I’ve stayed at

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear JLD0412,

Thank you so much for your glowing review! We're thrilled to hear that you had such a wonderful experience during your stay with us. It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed our prime location near the beach and that you found our rooms to be clean, spacious, and beautifully decorated.

Our team takes great pride in providing exceptional service, so we're delighted that you found everyone you encountered to be friendly, professional, and helpful. Tiago and Genis will be thrilled to hear that their efforts made your stay even more enjoyable. We'll be sure to pass along your compliments to them.

We're truly honored that you would choose to stay with us again. We look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay in the future!

Best regards,

Fatima Ahaddaf
Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: SOFITEL BARCELONA SKIPPER

data.text:
Best staff ever.  Clean and tidy rooms. Delicious breakfast and food in the restaurant.  Calm and cosy atmosphere. Perfect location and connection to transportation.

Overall, we had a perfect stay despite dynamic circumstances around the travel iterinary.
data.title: Perfect stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Sebastian F,

Thank you so much for your glowing review! We're thrilled to hear that you had such a wonderful experience during your stay with us. Our team works hard to ensure that every guest feels welcomed and well taken care of, and it's truly rewarding to hear that our efforts have made a positive impact on your stay.

We take great pride in maintaining high level of service, and creating a calm and cozy atmosphere for our guests to enjoy. We understand that travel plans can sometimes be unpredictable, but we're delighted to hear that despite any challenges, your stay with us was nothing short of perfect.

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again in the future. If there's anything else we can do to enhance your experience even further, please don't hesitate to let us know. 

Sincerely,

Fatima Ahaddaf
Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Fatima Ahaddaf

data.text:
Wonderfull room, wonderfull team, wonderfull location and wonderfull coffee breaks!
I highly recommend the Sofitel Barcelona Skipper for your next business or family trip in this incredible and vibrant city!
Do not hesitate, Sofitel is the place to be in Barcelona!
data.title: Just amazing !

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Catherineree,

Thank you so much for your wonderful review! 

We're delighted to hear that you had such an exceptional experience during your stay at Sofitel Barcelona Skipper. 

Our team takes great pride in providing exceptional service, and it's fantastic to know that our efforts were appreciated. We're thrilled that you enjoyed the room, the location, and the service.

Thank you for your recommendation, and we can't wait to welcome you back for another memorable stay, whether it's for business or leisure. 

Best regards,

Fatima Ahaddaf
Guest Experience Manager
